trends: There has been one other sighting in Crystal City
There were no other sightings in Crystal City on or around February 8th 2008
Summary: Objects in the night sky resembled orange fireballs, would swiftly shift formation, vanish then reappear.
divs: sighting detailsi was in crystal city, tx the night of 2\8\08. i was at a friend's house when suddenly my other friend points to the sky and shouts 'hey guys check this out!!!' we look to the southern sky and there was an orange 'orb' that was vanishing, then reappearing in a different position in the sky. then multiples would appear. 4 of them appeared and would position themselves in a triangular formation then shift to a linear formation, then vanish. the same pattern kept up for about an hour. at first i thought they could've been flares of some sort from say a fighter jet. we were trying to listen for the sound of a jet engine, to no avail. the objects were silent and were maneuvering through the air in the way a flare absolutely could not!
